alert.note: Alert for Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 3:23PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Rock County through 415 PM CDT... At 323 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Long Pine, or 9 miles south of Bassett, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newport and Pony Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 168 and 180. Highway 20 between mile markers 263 and 273. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
